titleStmt.title: A true recitall touching the cause of the death of Thomas Bales, a seminarie priest, who was hanged and quartered in Fleet-street on Ashwenesdaie last past. 1590 Wherevnto is adioyned the true cause of the death of Annis Bankyn, who vpon the next day following was burned in Saint Georges fields about sixe of the clocke at night.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by J. Wolfe] for William Wright,

notesStmt.note: Identified as STC 1310 on UMI microfilm.
Reproduction of the original in the Lambeth Palace Library.
